title: AI-generated disinformation tactics spotted ahead of COP30
description: A clip said to show massive flooding in the Amazonian city hosting the UN climate summit is just one widely-shared example of how disinformation, cheaply created by artificial intelligence and circulating on social media, is influencing perceptions of COP30. And in the video showing the city purportedly under water, "The reporter doesn't exist, the people don't exist, the flood doesn't exist, and the city doesn't exist."
content:

title: AI Is Eating All the Earnings
description: For investors, a concentrated portfolio of equity-market winners tends to work just fine — until it doesn’t. At the moment, the S&P 500 is a case in point: Its earnings remain both spectacular and spectacularly concentrated around the artificial intelligence story. The particulars are changing, and the profits are no longer accruing solely to tech and communications firms. But that doesn’t mean that the index’s fortunes are any less hitched to the AI theme.
content: For investors, a concentrated portfolio of equity-market winners tends to work just fine — until it doesn’t. At the moment, the S&P 500 is a case in point: Its earnings remain both spectacular and spectacularly concentrated around the artificial inte... [719 chars]

title: Michael Burry makes bets on Nvidia, Palantir
description: Michael Burry, the famed investor behind 'The Big Short,' is betting artificial intelligence is more of a bubble than a revolution.
content:
Michael Burry, the famed investor behind “The Big Short,” is betting artificial intelligence is more of a bubble than a revolution.

title: How AI is rebuilding the future of Civil Engineering
description: Artificial intelligence is revolutionising civil engineering by enabling predictive maintenance and smarter infrastructure. This shift demands engineers to combine traditional skills with data literacy to meet future challenges.
content: Artificial intelligence is quietly reshaping one of the world's oldest professions - civil engineering. What was once a field defined by blueprints, calculations, and on-site experience is now being reimagined through algorithms, sensors, and data-dr... [4445 chars]

title: Gemini AI To Boost Navigation And Hands-Free Assistance
description: Google is deepening its use of artificial intelligence inside Maps, rolling out an upgrade that integrates the company’s Gemini tool to improve hands-free navigation. The company has already added a range of AI-driven discovery tools over the past year and the latest update focuses on making navigation more intuitive while driving.
content: Google is deepening its use of artificial intelligence inside Maps, rolling out an upgrade that integrates the company’s Gemini tool to improve hands-free navigation. The tech giant has already added a range of AI-driven discovery tools over the past... [2089 chars]

title: How experts are using AI to better detect sleep apnea, especially in women
description: Mayo Clinic researchers have developed an artificial intelligence (AI) algorithm that can identify obstructive sleep apnea (OSA) using the results from an electrocardiogram (ECG)—a common heart test. The innovation could make it faster, cheaper, and easier to spot sleep apnea, particularly in women, who are often underdiagnosed.
content: Mayo Clinic researchers have developed an artificial intelligence (AI) algorithm that can identify obstructive sleep apnea (OSA) using the results from an electrocardiogram (ECG)—a common heart test. The innovation could make it faster, cheaper, and ... [1980 chars]

title: Meet Hoxo - First AI-Powered Humanoid Robot Deployed In Nuclear Sector By Capgemini, Orano
description: Orano and Capgemini have deployed the first intelligent humanoid robot in the nuclear sector. Deployed at the Orano Melox Ecole des Métiers in the Gard region of France, the robot is called Hoxo and comes equipped with embedded artificial intelligence and advanced sensors for real-time perception, autonomous navigation, execution of technical gestures, and interaction.
content:
Orano, a France-based organisation engaged in the recovery and transformation of nuclear materials, and technology company Capgemini have announced the deployment of the first intelligent humanoid robot in the nuclear sector.

title: Llangollen-based hotel group marks 10th anniversary with AI revolution creating 100 new jobs
description: A hotel group celebrating its 10th anniversary and investing in the power of Artificial Intelligence to drive growth and create 100 new jobs.
content:
The Everbright Group, which operates the Wild Pheasant Hotel & Spa in Llangollen, says using AI is enabling them to significantly reduce costs and provide a better, more personal service for guests.

title: US senators push new bill to track how AI is taking or creating jobs
description: A new bill aims to introduce quarterly requirements for major firms and federal agencies to disclose workforce changes, such as AI-driven hires, layoffs, and retraining, to the Department of Labor, reflecting growing concern around artificial intelligence’s impact on jobs.
content: A new bill set to be introduced in the US Senate could soon require significant changes in how companies and federal agencies report the impact of artificial intelligence on their workforces. According to information provided by PYMNTS.com, the draft... [3165 chars]
